comment: Complete Garbage and is now fired from SPSU because of it.  Did not teach you anything just pushed ideas upon you instead.
Great professor, he pushes you to find you limits

Great Professor !! Willing to spent more time if you need help . Easy-going, laid back personality!! He prints out most of the reading assignment for you so you don't have to even buy the book. I would love to take him again if I had the chance.
